name: 克里斯蒂·蒙登
name_full: 克里斯蒂·蒙登 Kristy Munden
introduction: Kristy Munden has worked in the television and film industry as a member of SAG/AFTRA since 1989. She has an extensive theater resume, including a number of years working in the vibrant Chicago theater community. She is the daughter of actress Alice Bjorklund. When she was 8 years old she saw her first play, a production of "Mister Roberts" with her father , Frank Plencner, in the lead role.
